hw_api->info

(PHP 4, PHP 5 < 5.2.0, PECL hwapi SVN)

hw_api->info — Returns information about server configuration

Description

array hw_api::info ( array $parameter )

Returns information about server configuration.

Parameters

parameter

Return Values
